Gaming – Metro http://metro.co.uk/entertainment/gaming/ Metro.co.uk: News, Sport, Showbiz, Celebrities from Metro Sun, 18 Feb 2018 16:54:14 +0000 en hourly 1 http://wordpress.com/ http://1.gravatar.com/blavatar/72ba1fb4e57339685f67d1d89b3db216?s=96&d=http%3A%2F%2Fs2.wp.com%2Fi%2Fbuttonw-com.png Gaming – Metro http://metro.co.uk/entertainment/gaming/ Fortnite Battle Pass season 2 is extended which means a longer wait for season 3 http://metro.co.uk/2018/02/18/fortnite-battle-pass-season-2-extended-means-longer-wait-season-3-7322468/ http://metro.co.uk/2018/02/18/fortnite-battle-pass-season-2-extended-means-longer-wait-season-3-7322468/#respond Sun, 18 Feb 2018 14:54:52 +0000 http://metro.co.uk/?p=7322468

Epic Games has announced that it has extended season 2 of its Battle Pass, meaning that players will have to wait longer for the season 3 release.

The Fortnite Battle Pass enables players to unlock new items for their playable character such as emotes, skins and unique gliders.

Fortunately for players who have already completed season 2 the battle pass has only been extended by one day, which means that it will end on 21st February instead of 20th.

This could mean that players will see the season 3 collectables launched on 22nd February which would tie-in with the game’s weekly update schedule which usually happens on Thursdays.

It polarises instantly and brings vitriolic discussions from both sides of the debate. This turns into shouting AND A LOT OF CASPLOCK pretty quickly.

But the reaction to criticism of the developer of Kingdom Come: Deliverance around racist undertones in the game has been huge.

GameCentral readers discuss how their video game preferences have shifted over the years, from the types of games to the consoles themselves.

The subject for this week’s Hot Topic was suggested by reader Grackle, who asked whether you’ve noticed a change in terms of the types of games you play, or major franchises you’ve changed your opinion on?

Many people mentioned they have less time for games as they’ve got older, with a tendency towards playing less games for shorter period. But others insisted their tastes haven’t really changed that much, just evolved with the technology.

Pokemon Go have released yet another update revolved around a special new Lunar New Year event.

The event is released to mark the Year Of The Dog, which kicked off on Thursday and will conclude on Saturday February 17.

So what are the perks of the event? More canine type Pokemon will become more common, including Poochyena, Growlithe, Eevee, Snubbull, and Electrike.

One of gaming’s most beloved, and strangest, developers has announced he’s working on a new game that will be out this year.

The old THQ may be dead and buried but the company that bought their name now owns even more of their old game franchises.

You may not even have heard of THQ Nordic before, but the Swedish company behind the publisher has been around since at least 2008.

They’ve been expanding ever since, by acquiring other companies and their brands, including the name THQ and many of their old franchises like Darksiders, Red Faction, and Sphinx And The Cursed Mummy.

One man’s labour of love finally lands on consoles, in what is one of the best-looking 2D games ever made.

Monster Hunter meh

I’m around 10 hours in, 11 assignments done, and I’m finding Monster Hunter: World just… OK. I’ve yet to have a fight that’s required the use of any degree of skill, any need for the many potions, bombs, etc. that I can pull together with the many things I have gathered. In Monster Hunter World there is a broad variety of weapons for players to chose from when they try to capture monsters.

Each weapon has special attributes and different stats to make it more useful in certain situations.

The hunting horn has appeared in previous Monster Hunter games and it returns again for Monster Hunter World.

The unique weapon enables players to produce melodies by combining notes with their attack.

Epic Games has continued to update and improve Fortnite with weekly updates, contributing to its ever-growing community.

Developers have now released their plans for the game over the next couple of months, which includes new limited modes, new cosmetics, enhanced gameplay and server improvements

The announcement also included the news that players will start to see some weapons removed from the game whilst new ones continue to be added.

This is being done to fit in with their aim of keeping the game fresh but balanced and to continue to provide new content for the players.
